name: Mink Bollis
content: Mink Bollis was a Human male who was an aide to Moff Glovstoak. He had "predatory" eyes and enjoyed female companionship. Shortly after the battle of Yavin 4, he attended his boss's party. There he spoke, among other things. with Deerian about the imperial problems with pirates. After seeing the drunken Mara Jade, he wanted to take her to a quiet place. However, Deerian got there first and took her to a bedroom.
